name: Rich Hotel
address: 86D Hung Vuong, Ninh Kieu District, Cần Thơ, Việt Nam
description:
Rich Hotel is offering accommodation in Can Tho. The hotel serves 3-star standards. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk.

All rooms in the hotel are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom, and certain rooms at Rich Hotel have a terrace. At the accommodation every room includes a seating area.

Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong is 300 metres from Rich Hotel, while Ninh Kieu Bridge is 2.3 km away. Can Tho International Airport is 9 km from the property.

review.comment_positive: The room itself was a good size and well equipped. Good location and reasonably priced.

Phòng hiện đại, đầy đủ tiện nghi, thoáng mát. Tọa lạc ngay vị trí ngay trung tâm, gần các điểm tham quan, xung quanh nhiều quán ăn, tạp hóa, cửa hàng tiện ích. Nhân viên ở đây siêu tốt luôn, mình đến Cần Thơ được các bạn nhiệt tình giúp đỡ. Khách sạn gần các điểm tham quan, gần bến Ninh Kiều và gần Vincom Plaza Hung Vuong. Đợt mình book có flash sale nên giá bao hời. Mọi người nên lên check gái để săn được giá rẻ nha.
Fantastic stay overall. exceptional service from staff, clean rooms, perfect location if you don’t want to be on top of
Vriendelijk personeel en uitstekende ligging.
Great rooms, very clean, staff are friendly and location is excellent! Room was spotless, and the bed was very comfortable. Staff were friendly.
Chỗ nghỉ giá rẻ, ở ngay trung tâm chỉ cần đi bộ một đoạn là ra đến chợ cần thơ

The whole experience is destroyed by the service attitude of the front desk female staff with an extremely uneducated attitude. I booked a room for 4 days and the female receptionist forced me to reset the card every day without notice. When I asked if this is the hotel's policy or not? Then this female employee was eating and laughing at the same time, and admit that it was her fault. I do not receive any apology but only an uneducated attitude. This attitude is repeated 2 times in a row. I do not recommend this hotel to anyone. Such a terrible experience.

review.comment_positive: Stanza pulita. Personale disponibile, ma difficoltà di comunicazione in inglese.
review.comment_negative: Albergo un po' fuori rispetto al centro città (circa 25 minuti a piedi). Avevo prenotato la colazione, ma a loro non risultava, e dunque non è stata servita.

review.comment_positive:
제가 머물렀던 곳은 503호인데 비상계단이 있어 환기에 용이 했고 비가 오는 날에는 문 열어 놓고 맥주 한잔 하기에 좋았습니다.

빈컴플라자가 가까워서 편리 했고

review.comment_negative: 프런트에서 열심히 의사소통하려고 노력했지만 의사소통이 원할하지 않았어요....

review.rating: Its ok for the price but probably would not stay again.
review.comment_positive: Nice staff very accommodating we originally booked a rook with 2 beds and were given only 1 bed but they quickly fixed that and gave us a nicer room with a balcony
review.comment_negative: The fridge in the room was dirty and had a plate with some old food left that smelled.  They give you like 4 small packets of body wash and shampoo. The window in the bathroom could not fully be closed.

review.rating: Totally different from what was presented
review.comment_positive: Nothing really as the photographs and facilities did not correspond to the information provided on booking.com
review.comment_negative: The room was not ready when we arrived, there was no hot water in the shower, the bathroom was dirty, there is no breakfast room and were informed we had to eat in the room. The breakfast consisted of two eggs an a sausage and dry bread and request for butter must be made the day before. We left the hotel on the second day as we could not stay there longer and booked another hotel.

review.rating: (잘 관리되지는 않았지만) 가성비 좋은 지방 2성급 호텔
review.comment_positive:
방도 큰 편이라 쾌적했고 직원들도 친절한 편이었다. 
까이랑 수상시장으로 배들이 출발하는 선착장과는 
2km 정도 떨어진 시내에 위치하지만 
이 것은 미리 알고 고른 숙소여서 문제가 안 됬다.
가까운 곳 로터리에 슈퍼마켓과 두끼. 숮불구이 같은
한국음식 식당들이 두 개나 있는
제법 큰 쇼핑몰이 300-400미터 거리에 있어 편리했다. 
호텔 바로 옆에는 (메콩델타 대표적인 메뉴인) 
com tam 전문 식당이 있고 
위에서 언급한 쇼핑몰 가는 길 골목에
저녁에만 영업하는 손님들로 붐비는 com tam, 
즉 느억맘 생선 소스로 간을 한 돼지고기를 
숯불에 구워 밥 위에 얹어 주는 서민 음식을 
30k, 한화로 1500-1800원에 파는 길거리 식당이 맛 나다.
review.comment_negative:
호텔이 잘 관리되지 않는지 
천정에 달린 대형 선풍기 날개에 먼지가 시커멓고
옷 장 위에도 먼지가 수북하고
에어컨은 오랜 시간 가동하지 않았는 지
전원을 켜고 30분 지나서야 겨우 찬 바람이 나왔다
냉장고도 상태가 그리 최상은 아니었다

Đẹp rất gần tất cả những nơi bạn muốn ghé thăm, đây là lần thứ 2 chúng tôi ở đây.

Room was very nice, comfortable bed, large well equipped bathroom. Cleanliness, location, cost. Good size room and good shower.
Very busy and staff very rushed. Need more wait staff at peak times. Lovely large clean room.

review.rating: больше не буду в нем останавливаться

review.comment_positive: The bedroom and bathroom are fully equipped and beautiful. Friendly and extremely welcoming staff. The price is reasonable and the location of the hotel is very convenient.
The hotel is located in an area with many shops but not noisy. Convenient for sightseeing and shopping. The staff is also very enthusiastic to help you when required. Value for money.
It was a big room and very clean, food it was delicious and excellent service
La localisation géographique de l'hôtel, malgré le côté bruyant du quartier nous y avons passé une bonne nuit par la tranquilité des lieux.
review.comment_negative: Le fait que nous avons payé un peu plus cher que le prix indiqué sur l'application.

review.comment_positive: The staff that support my family is very enthusiastic. During the process of exploring Can Tho, we lost our way, fortunately we contacted the reception and they guided us so we could return to the hotel. A 2 star hotel but very good quality. Comfortable room with wardrobe and dressing table. The room is also quite spacious. Near the center and Ninh Kieu wharf. 10 points for the hotel. Will definitely be back.
로비 인테리어 가 멋있었습니다

Go to Can Tho to travel and book a room here. Since we are still students, we can mainly experience anywhere. But the room was very surprised, looking luxurious and much larger than the picture. In general, it is more beautiful than the picture, very luxurious. Affordable price too. Ok service, enthusiastic support staff. Fully equipped rooms. Bed sheets are clean and new, not old. Very satisfied.
The good place. Convenient travel. Many restaurants around

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

Chambre assez grande
review.comment_negative:
Le personnel ne parle pas anglais et fait peu d'efforts pour aider les clients. L'hygiène est à améliorer, les bouteilles d'eau en chambre sont payantes. J'avais demandé un petit déjeuner (inclus dans le prix de la chambre) à 7 heures un matin, l'information n'avait pas été transmise. L'hôtel est loin des points touristiques de la ville. Le rapport qualité/prix est mauvais. 
La literie n'est pas terrible, les coussins sont très épais.

review.comment_positive: aspectul, locatia, curatenia

review.rating: Only slightly better than a Backpacker Hostel. Just slightly.
review.comment_positive: Air con worked.
review.comment_negative:
Bed extremely hard
Little to no hot water
Extremely noisy. No soundproofing at all. Noise from outside, corridor, other rooms and other floors. I could even hear the people in the next door room turning light switches on and off.
No decent eating places nearby.
TV had no reception
Rooms were about half the size of what online photos showed
There were condoms for sale on the beside table
I was overcharged for the room by 400.000VND
The whole property was not as described on bookings.com
I would not have booked this place if the photos and description had been accurate.

review.comment_positive:

I have stayed at Rich Hotel during a trip to Can Tho City and I am very satisfied with the experience. The hotel is conveniently located near tourist attractions and shopping outlets. Nice and clean room, attentive service and very dedicated staff. I highly recommend everyone to choose Rich Hotel when coming to Can Tho City

The hotel is located right in the center, so it is convenient to stay here, not having to move much. 10 points!

A hotel located near the main objectives.  In the room there is a TV, minibar and hair dryer.  The furniture is new, and the staff is benevolent and seeks to fulfill your requests.
review.comment_negative: Although the room's equipment is that of a three-star hotel, the walls are moldy, a bad smell persists in the bathroom, the soundproofing is almost non-existent, and breakfast is served in the room without coffee, which you have to buy from the cafes  from town.  Towels, shampoo, shower gel and room cleaning are available upon request.  For the price paid, you can't have too many demands, but I don't recommend a stay longer than two nights.

Rich Hotel là một trải nghiệm tuyệt vời cho một chuyến du lịch đến Thành phố Cần Thơ. Tôi đã được chào đón bởi nhân viên ks rất tận tình và có một phòng rộng rãi với tất cả các tiện nghi cần thiết. Địa điểm của khách sạn thuận tiện cho việc đi lại và gần các địa điểm du lịch quanh Thành phố. Tôi rất hài lòng về trải nghiệm tại Rich Hotel và sẽ khuyên mọi người cũng nên trải nghiệm tại đây thử 1 lần.
